channel.title: machine learning on ms2063
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on ms2063

item.title: Machine Learning - Feature Engineering
item.description: This article explains what Feature Engineering is, why it is important, and describes basic Feature Engineering techniques.

item.title: Machine Learning - Random Search
item.description: This article explains the concept of Random Search, one of the hyperparameter tuning methods to maximize the performance of models in machine learning, and introduce an example of implementation using the Scikit-learn library.

item.title: Machine Learning - Grid Search
item.description: One of the efficient methods to find the optimal parameters of a model in machine learning is Grid Search. This article explains what grid search is, how it works, and when it should be used.

item.title: Machine Learning - Cost Function
item.description: This article explains what Cost Function is for Machine Learning.

item.title: Machine Learning - Linear Regression Model
item.description: This article explains what Unsupervised Learning is for Machine Learning.

item.title: Machine Learning - Supervised Learning
item.description: This article explains what Supervised Learning is for Machine Learning.

item.title: Machine Learning - Unsupervised Learning
item.description: This article explains what Unsupervised Learning is for Machine Learning.
